title: Including me. Parts I and II
creator_credit: Indiana University. Audio Visual Center and Linda Janower
brief_description: Part I documents some of the problems encountered by handicapped individuals and explains how recent Federal legislation can help them find school programs appropriate to their needs. Part II focuses on four handicapped individuals who have succeeded in making progress in educational settings.
